mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM news2
SELECT m.id,m.title,m.content,m.time,m.sh3,m.lm3 ,p.id as pid,p.pic as pic,p.newsid FROM news2 m left join news_pics p on m.id = p.newsid where m.sh3=1 AND m.lm3 =#{lm3} order by m.time desc
SELECT m.id,m.title,m.content,m.time,m.sh3,m.lm3 ,p.id as pid,p.pic as pic,p.newsid FROM news2 m left join news_pics p on m.id = p.newsid where m.sh3=1 order by m.time desc
SELECT m.id,m.title,m.content,m.time,m.sh3,m.lm3 ,p.id as pid,p.pic as pic,p.newsid FROM news2 m left join news_pics p on m.id = p.newsid where m.sh3=1 and m.id=#{id} order by m.time desc
